EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Money 20/20_Q415.Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: It was great meeting you at Money20/20 in Las Vegas.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Whether you joined us at the Hackathon, met us 1 on 1, or visited the Pivotal Kiosk, we were glad to meet you in person! Below is some information we gathered that we thought would be of interest to you.
- Datasheet: Pivotal Cloud Foundry- <http://pivotal.io/platform/datasheet/pivotal-cloud-foundry-the-leading-enterprise-paas-powered-by-cloud-foundry> Cloud Native at Your Service - News: First Data and Pivotal collaborate to enable developers to quickly integrate payments across eCommerce and Mobile <https://www.firstdata.com/en_us/about-first-data/media/press-releases/09_23_15.html> - Learn How Your Enterprise Can Become Cloud Native <http://pivotal.io/cloud-native> - Read more about how Digital Solutions can transform your industry <http://pivotal.io/industries/>
To schedule a demo or speak with a Pivotal expert, contact Nick DiRubio
We look forward to conversing with you soon!
The Pivotal Team
